"Welcome to Ease The Waiting. This app is designed to ease the waiting for scheduled events in the future, such as special holidays, your birthday, or anything else.

To add yor first event, tap the big red button below. To add further events, tap the "+" sign in the bottom left, or tap the "Add Event" field at the bottom of your event list.

You will be able to choose title and date (in ISO format). To select a custom background image, simply tap the preview field in the add-event-screen.

Your data are yours. Everything is calculated and saved locally. Nothing is sent.
Nice! You figured it out. If you now want to edit this event, simply tap on it and you\'ll be able to edit it. If you want to add more events, tap the \"+\" sign again.
